title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Next-gen MSPs: From service providers to strategic partners. (PEX102)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 下一代MSP：从服务提供商到战略合作伙伴。(PEX102)
abstract: In today's rapidly evolving technology landscape, successful service providers must evolve beyond professional services or traditional break-fix and management services. This session provides a roadmap for modernizing your Managed Services Provider (MSP) practice to meet changing customer expectations. Together, we'll explore how to build predictable, recurring revenue streams; what MSPs require to support next-gen services delivery; tools that help you optimize but maintain margins; portfolios that combine highly sought-after services; and strategic relationships to expand capabilities without increasing overhead. We'll also share practical tools for identifying growth, balancing standardization with customization, and measuring key business metrics.
abstract_cn: 在当今快速发展的技术环境中，成功的服务提供商必须超越专业服务或传统的故障修复和管理服务。本次会议为现代化您的托管服务提供商(MSP)实践提供路线图，以满足不断变化的客户期望。我们将共同探讨如何构建可预测的经常性收入流；MSP支持下一代服务交付所需的条件；帮助您优化但保持利润率的工具；结合备受追捧服务的产品组合；以及在不增加开销的情况下扩展能力的战略关系。我们还将分享识别增长、平衡标准化与定制化以及衡量关键业务指标的实用工具。
